mapper.insert: insert into filter_rule (RULE_ID, RULE_NAME, FILTER_TYPE, EXECUTION_CHANNEL, CHANNEL_CONTACTS, EFFECTIVE_DATE, FAILURE_DATE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK) values (#{ruleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ruleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filterType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{executionChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelContacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{effectiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{failureDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update filter_rule set RULE_NAME = #{ruleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILTER_TYPE = #{filterType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXECUTION_CHANNEL = #{executionChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNEL_CONTACTS = #{channelContacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EFFECTIVE_DATE = #{effectiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FAILURE_DATE = #{failureDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RULE_ID = #{ruleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select RULE_ID, RULE_NAME, FILTER_TYPE, EXECUTION_CHANNEL, CHANNEL_CONTACTS, EFFECTIVE_DATE, FAILURE_DATE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from filter_rule where RULE_ID = #{ruleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select RULE_ID, RULE_NAME, FILTER_TYPE, EXECUTION_CHANNEL, CHANNEL_CONTACTS, EFFECTIVE_DATE, FAILURE_DATE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from filter_rule

select RULE_ID, RULE_NAME, FILTER_TYPE, EXECUTION_CHANNEL, CHANNEL_CONTACTS, EFFECTIVE_DATE, FAILURE_DATE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from filter_rule where RULE_ID = #{ruleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into filter_rule (RULE_ID, RULE_NAME, FILTER_TYPE, EXECUTION_CHANNEL, CHANNEL_CONTACTS, EFFECTIVE_DATE, FAILURE_DATE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK) values (#{ruleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ruleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filterType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{executionChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelContacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{effectiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{failureDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update filter_rule set
RULE_NAME = #{ruleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILTER_TYPE = #{filterType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXECUTION_CHANNEL = #{executionChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANNEL_CONTACTS = #{channelContacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EFFECTIVE_DATE = #{effectiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FAILURE_DATE = #{failureDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RULE_ID = #{ruleId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where RULE_ID = #{ruleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
